Description: Blue glazed composition reis shabti of Mr-ipt with purple painted detail: a lappet-wig, a summarily modelled face with traced eyes and summarily modelled hands holding a staff and a whip; the apron is inscribed with a column of purple painted Hieroglyphs.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1994 Jan-Mar, Doncaster Museum & Art Gallery, Ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
